doc:
Bernard Youens https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bernard_Youens 0 Bernard Arthur Popley (28 December 1914 – 27 August 1984), better known by his stage name Bernard Youens, was an English character actor, best remembered for his portrayal of Stan Ogden in Coronation Street from 1964 until his death in 1984. Bernard_Arthur_Popley ( 28_December_1914 – 27_August_1984 ) , better_known by his_stage_name_Bernard_Youens , was an_English_character_actor , best remembered for his_portrayal of Stan_Ogden in Coronation_Street from 1964 until his_death in 1984 .
